vision.notes: Visual capabilities within the Ixodidae family are not detailed in the provided context. Further research is required to determine the prevalence and characteristics of vision in these ticks.

chemoreception.notes: As ectoparasites, Ixodidae likely rely heavily on chemoreception to locate hosts. This inference is based on the general biology of ticks and ectoparasites.

mechanoreception.notes: Ticks are likely to use mechanoreception to detect the presence and movement of hosts. This inference is based on the general biology of ticks and ectoparasites.
